text: Patrick Kpozo (born 15 July 1997) is a Ghanaian professional footballer who plays for Östersunds FK as a defender.https://www.kickgh.com/more/ghanaians- abroad/3456-official-patrick-kpozo-joins-ostersund-fk ==Career== ===Club=== Kpozo made his professional debut for AIK in a Svenska Cupen match against Ekerö IK in 2015.
